"find studies that use optimization and model jailbreaking techniques." 

The ES search query would be:

```
{
  "query": "optimization model jailbreaking", 
  "fields": ["abstract"], 
  "size": 10, 
  "sort": [ {"_score": -1} ] }
```

This search query will return up to 10 studies that use optimization and model jailbreaking techniques. The results will be sorted by their `_score` value, which means the most relevant studies will appear first in the results.
